channel.title: Can someone post a complete list of moparscape 3.2 codes? e.g. ::pickup
channel.description: i can never find any...and if someone could give a code that lets you spawn items, cause ::pickup only works w/ GP :\

item.title: Can someone post a complete list of moparscape 3.2 codes? e.g. ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

there are only 2 commands i beileve that is built into the actual client and they are ::noclip and ::setitem the rest of them are in the source itself… and since every source is different you never will find the same commands in them =\

Read full topic

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone post a complete list of moparscape 3.2 codes? e.g. ::pickup

item.title: Can someone post a complete list of moparscape 3.2 codes? e.g. ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

::pickup works with any item, well most, some will cause the server to crash(mostly newer items)…

::pickup #### ####

The first 4 #'s are the id of the item, for coins, it is 0995, for a ring of stone 6583.
the id has to be 4 letters long, so if you want 137, you’d put 0137 etc…

the second 4 #'s are the amount you want, you can only put more then 1 for stackable items, such as coins/runes/noted items, otherwise put 1 here.
the second ones arent as strict, you can put 1, 10433, or 10000000

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone post a complete list of moparscape 3.2 codes? e.g. ::pickup
